mapper.select: SELECT id, password, name, email, role, phone, regdate, enabled FROM members ORDER BY regdate DESC
SELECT id, password, name, email, role, phone, regdate, enabled FROM members WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (id, password, name, email, role, phone, enabled) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{role}, #{phone}, true)
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET email = #{email}, phone = #{phone} WHERE id = #{id}
